name: Microwave Panasonic NNGT264MZTE
origAbout: The Panasonic NN-GT264M microwave oven with grill is designed specifically for busy people. This is a real find for those who understand the importance of regular and proper nutrition, but even on a day off they cannot devote much time to cooking. The Panasonic NN-GT264 microwave oven has an attractive modern design, and in combination with its compact size, it becomes a real find for a small kitchen. The Panasonic NN-GT264M microwave has 9 automatic programs with which you can easily and quickly prepare main dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
